response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am confident it will meet all your expectations. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $1,250,000. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for my efforts and investment in this product. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1250000}
